Installation¶

Penguins hasn’t been pushed to pypi yet, so the only way to install it is via my GitHub repo:

git clone https://github.com/yongrenjie/penguins
cd penguins
pip install .

Penguins’ requirements are:

  • Python 3.6+

  • numpy v1.17.0+

  • matplotlib (any version)

Technically there are no features that require recent versions of Python or numpy, but I used f-strings in the code, and I also feed pathlib.Path objects to np.fromfile() which relies on a relatively recent version of numpy.

penguins
